edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui
Class TagTableModel

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui.TagTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearchTagsListener, javax.swing.table.TableModel
public class TagTableModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.table.TableModel, SearchTagsListener

The data model of the table that displays the tags matching the current query and selects which ones should be used for filtering.

Nested Class Summary
